title: Doctor Who and the Dalek Invasion of Earth
description: The TARDIS lands in a London of future times - a city of fear, devastation and holocaust ... a city now ruled by Daleks.The Doctor and his companions meet a team of underground resistance workers, among the few survivors, but after an unsuccessful attack on the Dalek spaceship, they are all forced to flee the capital.A perilous journey through England finally brings them to the secret centre of Dalek operations ... and the mysterious reason for the Dalek invasion of Earth!
author: Terrance Dicks
